SummaryEnglish: The adventures of a 13-year-old shaman and his teammate a samurai warrior spirit, who traverse the world fighting evil spirits and misguided shamans on their journey to be the next Shaman King.

1.TitleEnglish: The Boy Who Dances with Ghosts
1.SummaryEnglish: Shaman Yoh Asakura offers to help his new classmate Manta face a notorious thug with the aid of a legendary samurai spirit.

2.SummaryEnglish: Yoh and Manta encounter the shaman Ren, who shows no mercy when fighting a punk. Furious at Ren’s misuse of his powers, Yoh faces him in battle.

3.SummaryEnglish: Anna tells Yoh about the new tournament to crown the next Shaman King. Ren's sister Jun challenges Yoh to a battle, with Amidamaru as the prize.

4.SummaryEnglish: After possessing Ryu, Tokageroh takes Manta hostage. Yoh and Amidamaru fight him, but Tokageroh wields Harusame and they're at a disadvantage.

5.SummaryEnglish: One of the Patch Officiants, Silva, unleashes his five animal spirits against Yoh to determine if he's worthy of participating in the Shaman Fight.

6.SummaryEnglish: Now qualified for the tournament, Yoh faces his first opponent, Horohoro of Hokkaido, a proud Ainu shaman who can manipulate ice and snow.

7.SummaryEnglish: Faust VIII, a necromancer who can manipulate corpses, enrages Yoh when he targets Manta for sadistic experimentation before their match.

8.SummaryEnglish: With Ren as his next opponent, Yoh distances himself from Manta to ensure his friend's safety. Later, Yoh returns to Izumo to continue his training.

9.SummaryEnglish: The last battle in the preliminary round begins. Fated rivals Yoh and Ren fight to the limit, but who will punch their ticket to the main tournament?

10.SummaryEnglish: Ren returns to China to take care of unfinished business. The BōZ Brothers ambush Yoh and Tamao, but a familiar face comes to their rescue.

11.SummaryEnglish: Back home, an imprisoned Ren vows to defeat his father after losing to him in a fight. Meanwhile, Yoh and the others set out for China to rescue Ren.

12.TitleEnglish: Ren vs. En - The End of the Tao
12.SummaryEnglish: Ren and his allies make their way toward En. The head of the Tao family may be a formidable foe, but Yoh and company aren't ones to back down.

13.SummaryEnglish: Yoh’s group meets the self-proclaimed future king. Those in the main tournament board a flight, not knowing their first trial is about to begin.

14.SummaryEnglish: As Yoh and the others prepare to travel to a town where a Patch Tribe village once stood, the dowser Lyserg appears and asks to join their group.

15.SummaryEnglish: Yohmei tasks Anna with delivering an ancient book belonging to the Asakura family to Yoh in the United States. Horohoro’s guardian Kororo goes missing.

16.SummaryEnglish: Searching for answers, Yoh and company arrive at the ancestral village of the Patch Tribe, where they find themselves beset by Hao’s followers.

17.SummaryEnglish: Facing Boris, Ryu unleashes a new power acquired from his training with Yoh's grandfather Yohmei. An unexpected person appears before Manta and Anna.

18.SummaryEnglish: Yoh's group reaches the Patch Tribe Village as they find the Great Spirits and learn the purpose of the Shaman Fight. A cheery shaman joins the team.

19.SummaryEnglish: While looking for Lyserg, Yoh and friends are confronted by Faust, who makes a startling offer. Finally the stage is set, and the Shaman Fight begins.

20.SummaryEnglish: Team Ren faces off against Hao's lackeys, Team Tsuchi-gumi. Joco recalls his past with a certain person after being cornered in a desperate situation.

21.SummaryEnglish: The second Shaman Fight begins as Team X-I of the X-Laws take on Egypt's Team Niles. But X-I's newest member is someone Yoh's group knows all too well.

22.SummaryEnglish: Team Funbari Hot Springs begins their first match versus the Icemen. But Yoh vows to defeat them with one attack thanks to the ultra senji ryakketsu.

23.SummaryEnglish: Overwhelmed by Faust's new Over Soul, the Icemen crumble under the pressure — then launch a sub-zero counterattack as the end of the match approaches.

24.SummaryEnglish: Yoh meets with Lyserg for a long-awaited conversation, but others lurking nearby intervene. Finally, X-Laws' team X-III takes on Hao's Hoshi-gumi team.

25.SummaryEnglish: Yoh watches helplessly as Team X-III desperately fights Hao, who reveals the secret of his birth and his thousand-year history with the Asakura clan.

26.SummaryEnglish: Yoh's friends are stunned by the revelation about Hao. Later, a mysterious masked man appears before Team Ren with an offer to make them stronger.

27.SummaryEnglish: Ren gains new power after taking on his powerful opponent. As the Shaman Fight continues, Hao's followers begin targeting teams outside the ring.

28.SummaryEnglish: Horohoro and Joco try to escape Hao's follower Peyote Díaz with an injured Ren, but Yoh makes a surprising entrance. Elsewhere, Anna makes her move.

29.SummaryEnglish: As Anna helps Mikihisa's teammates escape to their Shaman Fight, Tamao and Jun's battle against Hao's Hana-gumi heats up.

30.SummaryEnglish: Yoh accepts Jeanne's conditions as payment for healing Ren, leaving their friends in shock. Anna recalls the first time she met Yoh five years ago.

31.SummaryEnglish: Yoh tries to understand his fiancée, who continues to reject him and her connection to the demon attacking the town. Matamune's past is revealed.

32.SummaryEnglish: Bit by bit, Anna and Yoh get closer when they visit the shrine together for New Year's. But Anna's powers bring on a dangerous situation.

33.SummaryEnglish: Yoh and Matamune arrive at Mt. Osorezan to rescue Anna from the giant demon born from people's hearts, but Yoh only has one shot to save her.

34.SummaryEnglish: Yoh's path to being Shaman King is over. Ryu and Manta spy on Jeanne's successful resurrection of Ren, which has an unexpectedly powerful side effect.

35.SummaryEnglish: Horohoro finishes the fight with Brocken's team. Lyserg brings an injured Horohoro to Yoh's team when Peyote attacks with the intent to kill.

36.SummaryEnglish: Mikihisa's teammates, siblings Ludsev and Seyram, seek revenge against the person who killed their father. But Yoh steps in before it's too late.

37.SummaryEnglish: Golem's new user goes on a rampage while Ren, Ludsev and the others come up with a plan to bring them back to their senses. Hao gives Opacho a task.

38.SummaryEnglish: Opacho appears in front of Yoh with a message: Yoh must return to the Shaman Fight or Hao will destroy Golem and the children. What will he decide?

39.SummaryEnglish: Yoh has come to negotiate with X-LAWS to return to the Shaman Fight, but when Lakist intervenes, the situation becomes chaotic. However, when Lakist enters the fray, the battle turns violent. As the battle rages on, Jeanne, the leader of X-LAWS, appears!

40.SummaryEnglish: Following the Hao Faction and X-LAWS, the match between "Team Ming King" and "Team THE Ren" of Gandhara, the three major forces, has begun. The Ren struggles against the inexplicable technique of Yainage, which nullifies the Oversoul, and unleashes a new power! Which one of them will get the victory after the fierce battle?

41.SummaryEnglish: Team THE REN " defeated "Team MEIOH" by Horohoro's activity. However, this meant that they had to face the "Funbari Hot Spring Team". Hao's team is also steadily winning the Shaman Fight. At the same time, a suspicious group of people were approaching ...... to the determined Yoh.

42.SummaryEnglish: Yoh has fallen into hell at the hands of Sati, the leader of Gandhara. What is the identity of the person who appears in front of her in the depths of hell? And what is Gandhara's true intention in sending them to hell? In the midst of the chaos of the Shaman Fight, an unprecedented challenge stands in front of Yoh and his friends!

43.SummaryEnglish: While Yoh and his friends were training in hell, in the present world, Marco and Tamao were desperately resisting to protect Jeanne who had fallen by surprise by Hao's margin. In addition, the last resistance of X-LAWS "X-II", which was defeated by Hao, has caused an unexpected crisis.

44.SummaryEnglish: Hao's men are distrustful of Hao's inability to understand their true intentions, and defect from him. Hao's minions distrust Hao's inability to read their true intentions and turn against him, but Anna manages to wound Hao using a secret technique, and Hao manifests the ultimate oversoul. Meanwhile, Hao and his men take to the stage for another Shaman Fight to settle the score!

46.SummaryEnglish: Yoh and his team go to the site of the decisive battle and are confronted by a large fleet of ships of unknown affiliation and the strongest trump card of the X-LAWS, but they are wiped out by Hao's overwhelming power. Then, Yoh and his team step into the site of the second tournament and make a decision they never thought they would make: ......!

47.SummaryEnglish: Finally, the winner of the shaman fight is decided. In order to prevent the extinction of the human race, Yoh and his friends try to prevent the fusion of Hao and Great Spirits, but the Patch Tribe blocks their way to protect the birth of the new Shaman King. Among them is the man who once guided Yoh!

48.SummaryEnglish: Defeat ten plants that recreate every natural environment and the ten priests who guard them. This was the only way to reach Hao. Thanks to the efforts and sacrifices of their friends, the Warriors continue to move steadily forward, but finally, Hao reaches the company of the king. Little time is left until the birth of the new Shaman King--!

49.SummaryEnglish: When Yoh and his friends arrived at Karim, the priest in charge of Horohoro, they were exhausted from the repeated fierce battles. Karim's advice to rest for the time being was followed by an unexpected "gift" to the Ipas. Could it be the trump card to defeat Hao?

50.SummaryEnglish: After a brief respite at the highland plant, Ip and his friends once again take on the priest Karim. During the resumed mortal combat, the darkness that Holoholo has been harboring is finally revealed. ...... And finally, that man stands in the way of Yoh and his friends as they trudge through the remaining plants!

51.SummaryEnglish: After defeating Silva, the ninth priest, Yoh and his friends enter the final plant, "Universe," only to be confronted by the last priest, Razaho. The leaves find themselves in a desperate predicament in the face of Razaho's inexplicably powerful and matchless techniques. Finally, the ultimate despair that everyone had feared awakens. ......!

52.SummaryEnglish: Hao has finally reached the Shaman King and become a new god. His friends fall one after another in the face of his overwhelming power. As the countdown to mankind's extinction continues, Yoh and his friends, shamans who communicate with spirits, have not yet given up hope.

2.SummaryEnglish: Although nothing was supposed to happen during the 500 years after the last Shaman Fight, in which Yoh and his friends participated, a disagreement between the gods triggers a new confrontation between the shamans at the end of which the shape of this world will likely change.

1.SummaryEnglish: 14 years after the Shaman Fight, Asakura Hana is attacked by Yohane and Luca who want to kill Hana and take his place as the true heirs of the Asakura Family.

2.SummaryEnglish: After running across Tamamura Tamao, Asakura Hana hides that he was fighting again and rushes back to Funbari Onsen. Tamao decides to take Umemiya Ryunosuke's motorcycle so that she can investigate the secret Asakura Family. Back at the inn, Hana is caught by the Hana-Gumi Waitresses. By the time Hana returns with the first aid kit to the cemetery, Yohane is gone.

3.SummaryEnglish: After waking up in the hospital, Asakura Hana believes the previous night's events to have been a dream and intults Alumi Numbirch's appearance. Overhearing this, she punishes him and then chews out Umemiya Ryunosuke, Tokageroh, and Amidamaru.

4.SummaryEnglish: After receiving some advice from Hana, Yohane declares that they are now friends. Soon after, Hana’s class receives yet another transfer student.

5.SummaryEnglish: Amidamaru was turned into stone by Rika's hands. Hana, who has no more spirits, is hit by Ryuji's special move ``Wal no Ryofu'' and faints. Rika uses Ryuji to try to stop Hana from dying to its roots. Seeing this, Haba realizes that her sister is being manipulated by something and tries to release her oversoul, but...

6.TitleEnglish: An Oni Lies Down by the River
6.SummaryEnglish: A flower that experienced death in the past and was brought back to life by Hao. The condition was that the flower would possess the power of a demon, and that power would be activated when the flower was on the verge of death, so that it would never die again. Hana learns this fact and becomes depressed. He realizes that he can't do anything without Amidamaru, and he becomes keenly aware of his own helplessness.

7.SummaryEnglish: Hana wonders who she is on a hill above the cemetery. She realizes that Gakko Ibuki, a Yankee-style shaman who suddenly speaks to her from behind, has picked a fight with her, and she prepares for battle. Hana counters Gakko, who unleashes Oversoul NAMA-HAGE, with the ``demon'' that resides within her. Gradually, Hana loses her sanity and is absorbed by the power of a giant demon.

8.SummaryEnglish: Just when Gakko and Namaha think they have conquered the power of the demonized flower, they find themselves in a pinch when faced with the demonized flower again. At that moment, aluminum appeared... Aluminum calls Gakko ``Team Hao Anti-Demon Division Commander,'' and introduces Haba, who has joined them, to Gakko as ``a member of Team Hao.'' Hana and Haha don't know what's going on, so Alumi begins to explain about ``Flower of Maze.''

9.TitleEnglish: The Same Age ~Me, My Father, and My Uncle!~
9.SummaryEnglish: Gakko and Yohane try to protect Hana from Tao Men's sudden attack but are swiftly defeated. An enraged Hana responds by unleashing a demonic power.

10.SummaryEnglish: Suddenly finding himself beside a crashed fighter plane on a beach, Hana encounters the aircraft's pilot, who says they are in the middle of a war.

11.SummaryEnglish: Thalim suddenly appears and brings Sakurai and Hana to his café to talk. At Funbari Hot Springs, Tao Men demands to see his mother's iron maiden.

12.SummaryEnglish: After Anderson's plane crashes into the café, Yohsuke uses special cards in a bid to stop Hao's plan to turn Sakurai into Hana's guardian spirit.

13.SummaryEnglish: Finding himself at a Japanese military airfield, Hana realizes it is the day before Sakurai's fateful flight. That night, the base comes under attack.
